In its simpleset form, the posts here are an exploration of how the quantitative and qualitative data sources used to form judgement in how international development evaluative practices can be better informed through analysis, representation, and automation in the R programming language.

This site is contructed using the [blogdown](https://github.com/rstudio/blogdown) R package and [Hugo](https://gohugo.io/). All opinions represented in this blog are my own, and do not represent those of my employer.
